description: Number of connected labeled T_4-topologies with n points.
references: N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
links: Herman Jamke, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..19
M. Erné, Struktur- und Anzahlformeln für Topologien auf Endlichen Mengen, Manuscripta Math., 11 (1974), 221-259.
formula: From Herman Jamke (hermanjamke(AT)fastmail.fm), Mar 02 2008: (Start)a(n) = Sum_{k=0..n-1} binomial(n, k)*A000798(k) if n>=1.E.g.f.: Z4(x) = A(x)*(exp(x)-1) + 1 where A(x) denotes the e.g.f. for A000798. (End)
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_
extensions: More terms from Herman Jamke (hermanjamke(AT)fastmail.fm), Mar 02 2008
